Topic.Title: Where can we read what's new in 5.6.2?

Posts.EditableText: I figured the help in the game would have a "what's new" section but nothing. Is there a boiled-down feature list somewhere for each point release?
Posts.HTML: I figured the help in the game would have a "what's new" section but nothing. Is there a boiled-down feature list somewhere for each point release?

Posts.EditableText: probably your best bet, is to try looking in the 'site announcements' forum board, and looking for threads-posts on new releases... or maybe just try looking online (googling) for alex' blogs on~of new quest releases, maybe... otherwise, there's this, but it's older versions: http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... notes.html --------- otherwise, Alex has been too busy working on QuestKit (the new~next generation of Quest), to document his last releases of normal quest. maybe some of the stuff in the section on questkit talks about updates in the last versions of normal quest.
Posts.HTML:
probably your best bet, is to try looking in the 'site announcements' forum board, and looking for threads-posts on new releases... or maybe just try looking online (googling) for alex' blogs on~of new quest releases, maybe...

otherwise, there's this, but it's older versions:

http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... notes.html

---------

otherwise, Alex has been too busy working on QuestKit (the new~next generation of Quest), to document his last releases of normal quest.

maybe some of the stuff in the section on questkit talks about updates in the last versions of normal quest.

Posts.EditableText: It's just minor bug fixes. You can see some of them by looking at the list of bugs that were closed for this release https://github.com/textadventures/quest ... t+5.6.2%22
Posts.HTML: It's just minor bug fixes. You can see some of them by looking at the list of bugs that were closed for this release https://github.com/textadventures/quest ... t+5.6.2%22
